sections.name: Executive Summary
sections.description: One- to three-page description of the plan

sections.name: Introduction
sections.description: Type of business owned and operated, description of products/services offered, and unique characteristics of the business (3 points each)

sections.name: SWOT Analysis
sections.description: Strengths, weaknesses, opportunities, and threats of the business (3 points each)

sections.name: Five Year Plan to Grow and Expand the Business
sections.description: Expansion opportunities (4 pts), new market analysis (4 pts), and marketing plan (3 pts)

sections.name: Financing Plan
sections.description: Current financial situation, fixed overhead and cost of operations, capital needed for expansion, and time to achieve profitability (3 points each)

sections.name: Appearance and Word Usage
sections.description: Professional layout, neatness, proper grammar, spelling and word usage
